pages.text: Laser Focus Matrix are part of the $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l) multiblock.$(p)They are where you will be directing your laser beam to in order to ignite a $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l).
They also act as a barrier for any laser beams, being able to prematurely block a laser beam without being slowly broken by said laser beam, unlike how every other blocks react to laser beams.
